api_security.auth: Header-based API key auth (X-API-Key) for REST; query param api_key for WS demo. Production should use stronger auth.
api_security.schema_validation: Pydantic request models enforce schema and types for REST endpoints.
api_security.rate_limit: In-memory token bucket per client id; production should use redis/gateway.
api_security.logging: Recommend request-id + timestamp logs; add structured audit logs before production use.
api_security.websocket_auth: WS uses api_key query param for demo; production should use session/bearer-based auth.
api_security.disclaimer: Research scaffold only; not production hardened; do not expose without proper security review.
